msbt.message: I'm so glad to see you wearing the I gave you, ! That's so cool. I feel like an artist, painting the world with my fashion sense
You are looking good in your , yo!It's such a natural look for you, like you've been rocking that style your whole life!
You have got to tell me where you got that outfit, .I especially love your . Wait.You're wearing the that I gave you, ! How could I have parted with something so fabulous?
Am I crazy, or are you wearing the that I gave you? That's so cool! It's clear you recognize good taste.
Ooh, I like what I see Your !Don't forget who you have to thank for that look, OK?<10_4 /> It's original!
Hey, so you're wearing , right?Can you tell me more about that look? Like, you know, what was your inspiration for it? Ha! I'm kidding, I'm kidding! I know your inspiration was me.
Your says "" more than "" itself!
Hold on. I have a comment on your .You. Are. CRUSHING IT! Way to make the rest of us look like fashion fools, !
, your whole ensemble todayit is WORKING.And the really ties it together.
I think they should name the after you, because you are owning it!
That outfit is serious business, and the ? Icing on the cake. What? Icing is serious business.
My oh my The look you've come up with todayIt's fabulous! And how about the things you can do with
Oh, That outfit you're wearing is perfection. And the ? What's more perfect than perfection? Because it's that.
Do my eyes deceive me, or are you wearing ? Not everyone realizes how much impact the right footwear can make.And don't even get me started on what the WRONG footwear can do for your whole look.
That outfit you're wearing is really unusualin a good way. And you designed it yourself, you say? Very impressive. Shocking folks with original design is a lost art if you ask me, .
Whoa, are you really wearing the signature ? Do you know ? Can you get me an autograph?
Whoa, that outfit you're wearing You don't see that kind of look every day around here. Oh, it's a custom design? From ? Well, no wonder! Looks like the fashion scene on is really thriving!
Well, look at you! All fresh and fancy for spring in your !
Well, you're looking breezy, ! Glad to see you all decked out for the season. Seriously. I wish I had the good sense to be wearing .
Ooh, the season is turning and you're right there with your wardrobe. That's to say, I really dig the !
Ooh, you look toasty and trendy in your !
Oh, what are you doing?I've tried to pull off some bold fashion choices in my day, believe me. But no one can pull off in the heat of the summer!
Uhare you really wearing ?!You're not cold? Like, even a little bit? I'm cold just looking at you!
Oh, That outfit you're wearing is straight-up . And now I'm actually hungry for
There's something very cool about what you're wearing today, and I don't mean the fabric. I could see myself wearing something similar, belting out in front of a million adoring fans

You know what never goes out of style? Classic stuff. Kinda like the outfit you've got on right now. Don't get me wrong. I like to get real weird with fashion, but classic stuff is classic for a reason.
Whoa! You are dressed to the nines today. Maybe even the tens!What's the occasion? Launching a new fragrance? Attending a new fragrance launch? Welp, I'm out of ideas. Help me out, .
I'm loving your outfit today, . It looks super comfy, and also super stylish. That's like the holy grail of fashion!
Hey, you're really dressed up today! You headed to the after-party?There's no "before" party that I know about, but I always ask everyone just in case. Ha HA!
Heh. You sure seem to wear that outfit a lot.OH! I didn't mean it that way. It looks great on you, so why wouldn't you wear it all the time? Whew. Saved it.
That outfit is getting to be, like, your signature outfit. That's good for your brand, !
There's something special about the combination of and .
I see you're still rocking your todayDid you get cast in something? Are you method acting right now?OK, OK, don't break character, but raise your left eyebrow slightly if the answer is yes!
What can I say? You look sharp in your as usual, !
I'm loving this feline-themed ensemble you've got going on today.Ooh! I hope this is the start of a hot new trend. 'Cause then I can say I had this look before it was cool.
There's something enigmatic, yet completely adorable about your vibe today, . Yeah. Whatever you're doing, keep doing it, .
Woah! You are, like, Bunny Day incarnate. And may I just say, you've achieved eggs-traordinary results. That's what I like about you. When it comes to fashion, you never hold back, .

So I noticed that you're wearing .Is something special going on today? Because I don't usually see you this dressed up, You going to a party? Is it a secret party? When does it start? You know what? It doesn't matter. If you need a DJ, I'm free.
Sweet outfit, .It can be hard to walk that fine line between nutrish and delish, but you nailed it, .
How'd you know I was casting for my latest film project, "Knights of the Gilded "? I don't know how you found out about it, but I'll mail you a copy of the NDA, and we'll go from there.
It makes total sense that you want to be a pilot, .The outfit alone commands respect. I'd buckle my seatbelt right now if you told me to, without question. You know, if I had one on me.
I can tell from your outfit that you have some experience on the ice.As a longtime fan of ice-skating slash dancing, I've always wanted to know Aren't you freezing?!
Haven't I seen you in that outfit before? Wait. Is wearing the same thing over and over again hip now? Finally! I've been trying to make this happen for years, !
This is your favorite outfit, isn't it? I knew it. I have a nose for this kind of thing, . Just call me fashion detective! Ha HA!
I've always loved that outfit on you. I consider it to be the centerpiece of the aesthetic.
